title: Couture Embroidery Sample (USA), 1930s
medium:
Medium: metal thread,  jewels, glass beads
Technique: embroidery on pile weave
inscribed:
"Gold Cording
Bonnaz Emb.
Hand Embr.
Boullion Embr.
Jewels
+ Rhinestones"
description: Red velvet fabric embroidered in a partially completed, heart-shaped motif worked in purple seed beads, gold bugle and round beads, green, orange and purple rhinestones and fuschia colored metal thread in a boullion stitch.

tombstone.epitaph:
Couture Embroidery Sample (USA), 1930s. Medium: metal thread,  jewels, glass beads
Technique: embroidery on pile weave. 
Gift of David Glickman. 1977-81-47
